voiceDetection.title: Voice Detection
voiceDetection.description: Configure how the AI detects when you're speaking
voiceDetection.conservativeDesc: Waits for you to finish speaking. Reduces unwanted responses.
voiceDetection.alwaysOnDesc: Automatic voice detection. AI responds when you stop speaking.
voiceDetection.pushToTalkDesc: Hold Space key to transmit. Best for preventing unwanted responses.
voiceDetection.toggleDesc: Press Space to start/stop transmission. Like a walkie-talkie.
voiceDetection.inputModeWarning: ⚠️ Input mode must be set before connecting

systemAudioSetup.advancedSetupNote: For detailed information: See the SYSTEM_AUDIO_SETUP.md file in the project for platform-specific detailed setup instructions.

alwaysOn.title: Always On
alwaysOn.description: Microphone is always active and automatically detects when you speak.
alwaysOn.recommended: Recommended: Quiet environments, voice memos, task management

pushToTalk.title: Push-to-Talk (PTT)
pushToTalk.description: Microphone is only active while holding the Space key.
pushToTalk.recommended: Recommended: Noisy environments, use during meetings

toggle.title: Toggle
toggle.description: Toggle microphone on/off with the Space key.

micNotRecognized.title: Microphone not recognized
micNotRecognized.step2: Check if the correct microphone is selected in "Audio Settings"
micNotRecognized.step3: Check if other apps are using the microphone

systemAudioNotCaptured.title: Cannot capture system audio
systemAudioNotCaptured.step1: Check if you're using Chrome or Edge (Firefox and Safari are not supported)
systemAudioNotCaptured.step2: Check if "Share system audio" is checked when sharing screen
systemAudioNotCaptured.step3: If using virtual audio cables, check if they are configured correctly

connectionError.title: Connection error occurs
connectionError.step2: Check if OpenAI API key is configured correctly
connectionError.step3: Check error messages in browser console
